name: Monstrous Pack
description:
Formats include: SVG and PNGs (full body only)

Chalk full of RPG creatures designed with the capability of being animated.

Each character is broken up into their individual parts and grouped.

*Free pack to anyone willing to create PNGs for each body part. Email me at: MikeMac2d@gmail.com if you are interested.*

Feel free to use for commercial use as well as edit.

Royalty Free!
